meanings.definition: Having a large amount of excess body fat.
meanings.sent1: The cat was the fattest in the litter, waddling around the yard.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the fattest pumpkin in the patch.
meanings.sent3: The fattest squirrel in the park always beat the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: The fattest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The fattest bear in the forest was known for his love of honey.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of the adjective 'fat'.
meanings.sent1: Among the siblings, she was known as the fattest.
meanings.sent2: He proudly displayed the fattest of his coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The fattest of the cakes was saved for last at the party.
meanings.sent4: The fattest of the books on the shelf was a dictionary.
meanings.sent5: The fattest of the clouds blocked out the sun, casting a shadow over the field.

meanings.sent1: Feeding the ducks too much bread can quickly fatten them.
meanings.sent2: She worried that the rich desserts would fatten her waistline.
meanings.sent3: The baker tried to fatten the dough by adding extra butter.
meanings.sent4: The farmer fattened the pig by giving it plenty of food.
meanings.sent5: The chef knew how to fatten up a stew with hearty ingredients.
